Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Converts a typecast to an "TypeOf ... Is ..." expression.

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Converts an HTML color string (e.g., "#FF0000") to a new color instance (e.g., "Color.FromArgb(&HFF, &H00, &H00)")

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Converts an HTML color string (e.g., "#FF0000") to a new color instance (e.g., "Color.FromArgb(&HFF, &H00, &H00)")

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Converts an HTML color string (e.g., "#FF0000") to a new color instance (e.g., "Color.FromArgb(&HFF, &H00, &H00)")

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Converts a field declaration (e.g., "Private myTable As Hashtable") into code that constructs an instance of that identifier (e.g., "myTable = New Hashtable()") when pasted on an empty line inside a method or property.

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Converts a field declaration (e.g., "Private _MyTable As Hashtable") into code that constructs an instance of that identifier (e.g., "_MyTable = New Hashtable()") when pasted on an empty line inside a method or property.

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Converts a statement that constructs a new identifier into a declaration.

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Converts an if-statement with an expression to simply the expression when pasted inside parens

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Creates a new method when a method declaration from an interface is pasted on an empty line inside a class or struct.

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Creates a property from a field declaration.

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Creates a new property when a property declaration from an interface is pasted on an empty line inside a class or struct.

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Creates a property from a declaration for a prefixed field (e.g., "_MyField", or "m_MyField").

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Creates a new property when a property declaration from an interface is pasted on an empty line inside a class or struct.

Option.Value: Creates a new property when a property declaration from an interface is pasted on an empty line inside a class or struct.

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Creates a new method declaration when a method call is pasted on an empty line outside a method.

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Converts an "is" test to a typecast

Option.Name: Comment
Option.Value: Creates a new local variable of the type tested in the "is" expression, and initializes it to the identifier typecast as that type. Valid on empty lines in code blocks.
